title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Mastering Laparoscopic Small Intestine Anastomosis Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental laparoscopic surgery theory and experience operating basic surgical equipment
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Perform laparoscopic jejunojejunostomy (JJA) and gastrojejunostomy (GJA) 25 times in a simulated environment with 90% accuracy
Reduce anastomosis procedure time by 40% compared to baseline and maintain leakage rates below 5%
Identify and execute core techniques (suturing, ligation, resection) for each surgical phase with over 80% accuracy
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
